pr_title: Add a JAX-RS MULTIPART_FORM_DATA test that consumes a .csv file with at least 256 characters of data

timeline.bodyText: Probably you should move the stream.close(), out.flush() and out.close() into a finally{} with null checks.
timeline.author: jim-krueger

replies.bodyText: +1 or use try-with-resources to auto close
replies.author: andymc12

timeline.author: andymc12
